fields.name: latitude
fields.doc: Latitude in the WGS  reference coordinate system

fields.name: longitude
fields.doc: Longitude in the WGS  reference coordinate system

fields.name: n
fields.doc: The North offset of the North/East/Down field with respect to Latitude/Longitude/Height

fields.name: e
fields.doc: The East offset of the North/East/Down field with respect to Latitude/Longitude/Height

fields.name: d
fields.doc: The Down offset of the North/East/Down field with respect to Latitude/Longitude/Height
